concept.title: The Synology WRX560 Model
concept.shortdesc: Wondering what makes the Synology WRX560 different from other Wi-Fi router models? Read to learn more about the unique features it offers!

section.p: Released by Synology Inc. in November of 2022, WRX560 is a mesh Wi-Fi 6 router model that offers fast speeds and a wider range of internet coverage due to its high-performance internal antennas, compact design, and ability to handle channels of varying bandwidths. The model comes with several unique features, including:

ul.li: Mesh Wi-Fi: You can combine multiple Synology routers (WRX560 or otherwise) under a single Wi-Fi name for full-home coverage.
Smart Connect: The WRX560 offers an optimized signal that automatically steers your devices toward the fastest and strongest Wi-Fi band.
Parental Controls: Families can monitor devices the Wi-Fi is used on, restrict access to specific websites, and set screen time limits.
Remote Access: You can control the router remotely, including its parental controls, traffic monitoring tool, and management settings.
